alert.note: Alert for Brown; Jackson; Jefferson; Nemaha; Shawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 11:55PM CDT until June 08 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jefferson County in northeastern Kansas... Northern Shawnee County in east central Kansas... Southeastern Nemaha County in northeastern Kansas... Jackson County in northeastern Kansas... Brown County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1155 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Woodlawn to near Holton to 4 miles southeast of Delia, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Holton, Hiawatha, Seneca, Horton, Valley Falls, Rossville, Oskaloosa, McLouth, Meriden, Hoyt, Ozawkie, Nortonville, Winchester, Wetmore, Mayetta, Everest, Fairview, Robinson, Whiting and Denison. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
